summary: This document is an email chain from July 6, 2019, between U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman and other recipients, providing real-time updates on the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein. It details that Epstein is in custody, search warrants are being executed, and confirms his presence on a flight from a manifest obtained by the FBI.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email chain providing updates on Epstein's arrest and flight status. He communicates that Epstein is in custody and search warrants are being executed.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the updates; confirmed to be in custody and listed on a flight manifest obtained by the FBI.

persons.name: Judge Moses
persons.context: Signed the search warrant related to the Epstein investigation on the morning of July 6, 2019.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is overseeing the investigation and arrest of Epstein, as indicated by his updates on Epstein's custody and flight status.
Judge Moses signed the search warrant authorizing law enforcement actions related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Epstein Arrest and Warrant Execution
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is taken into custody, and search warrants are being executed as part of the investigation.

events.title: Search Warrant Signed by Judge Moses
events.description: Judge Moses signs a search warrant related to the Epstein investigation in the morning.

events.title: FBI Receives Flight Manifest from CBP
events.description: The FBI receives a flight manifest from Customs and Border Protection listing Epstein and two pilots as passengers.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was confirmed to be in custody on July 6, 2019, with search warrants being executed at that time.
A federal judge, Judge Moses, signed a search warrant related to the Epstein investigation on the morning of July 6, 2019.
The FBI received a flight manifest from Customs and Border Protection the night before, listing Epstein and two pilots as passengers, and planned to confirm the passengers after takeoff.
